scenariodescription: The robot is transporting a box from Rack A to the packaging area. While navigating through the Passageways, the robot encounters a group of 3 warehouse employees standing in the middle of an intersection. The robot needs to pass through this intersection to reach the packaging area.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 is part of a group of 3 humans. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 1 gives way to the robot until the robot is not close anymore. If the robot doesn't say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 1 continues standing in the group and occasionally looks in the direction of the robot.
humanbehavior.Human 2: Human 2 is part of a group of 3 humans. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 2 gives way to the robot until the robot is not close anymore. If the robot doesn't say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 2 continues standing in the group and occasionally looks in the direction of the robot.
humanbehavior.Human 3: Human 3 is part of a group of 3 humans. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 3 gives way to the robot until the robot is not close anymore. If the robot doesn't say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 3 continues standing in the group and occasionally looks in the direction of the robot.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot says 'EXCUSE ME' when it encounters the group of employees at the intersection. It waits for the group to give way and then proceeds through the intersection to the packaging area.
